summary: Task management application with task list functionality experiencing loading issues
architectural_notes: Application deployed on Internet Computer with asset canister
Frontend uses React with React Query for data fetching
Task list feature implemented but experiencing loading issues on click
known_issues: Tasks not loading when clicked - requires investigation of task detail view or data fetching
Recent deployments experienced HTTP 503 errors and asset serving issues
Application showing 'Something went wrong!' error on initial load in some cases

existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the issue preventing tasks from loading when the Tasks page is clicked. Verify that the tasks query is executing correctly, error boundaries are catching failures, and loading states are properly handled in TasksPage.tsx.
Add error logging and diagnostics to the Tasks page component to capture and report any data fetching failures, including query status, error messages, and network request details.

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify that the public tasks query endpoint (publicGetTasks) is accessible and functioning correctly, ensuring the backend canister is responding to requests.
